description: Have you ever tried to raise money for your business by yourself? It was probably a failed attempt or took too long, right? Having a DealTeam on your side while fundraising is the #1 way to help bring money quicker into your business. This course explains what a DealTeam is, how to recruit one, and the responsibilities once they're on board. Sign up for this continuously updated course and learn to take the stress out of the fundraising process!
title: Find And Assemble A DealTeam
